text: Aldo Vicente Cornejo González (born 19 April 1955) is a Chilean politician who served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies, representing District 13 of the Valparaíso Region and as Mayor of Valparaíso. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies of Chile Category:Pontifical Catholic University of Valparaíso alumni Category:Christian Democratic Party (Chile) politicians Category:Mayors of Valparaíso
title: Aldo Cornejo
